Name: Queensway
Phrase: There are more Phantom Mist than in the morning. I hope the Gendarmerie are all fine...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Don't worry about that. There is no better army in the Iris Cloud than the Verforet Gendarmerie when it comes to combat inside forests.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: There's a famous saying: If you step on snow, you're in Eisengrad; If you go into the forest, you're in Verforet.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: That's what an officer from the Northern Front said, because on the border between Eisengrad and Verforet are two battlefields: the forest area and the snowy mountains.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It's frustrating, but what Vivienne said is true - the way the Verforet Gendarmerie fights in the forests cannot be mimicked even by trained Eisengradian soldiers.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I'm very interested to hear about that! What exactly are the kinds of fighting style do you all have!?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: They move very fast anyway. They disappear out of sight and reappear from the most unexpected places.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: We don't just use the ground, we also use the trees - Verforet rangers are good at tree climbing and hide-and-seek.
Kuhuhuhuh, fellow knights who are lost in the forests of Verforet! It appears that you all still can't seem to find my whereabouts!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: ...See? I think you've find yourselves an excellent example.
Kuhahahaha! The fairy of Brocéliande have noticed! She's sensed my Sacred Holy Power!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Oooooh~? Where is this voice coming out from?

Name: Putra
Phrase: I-I feel that sounded like it's from a weirdo...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Well, it's usually the weird ones that don't show themselves when they appear.
How rude! I've already shown my face! Don't just look down on the ground! Look above!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Up?

Name: Putra
Phrase: Ah! Over there! Up in the trees! Look, the highest point over there.
A girl stood at the top of where Putra pointed to, probably the tallest tree in the area. She is holding her position with her back straight and her arms folded.
That's Rouen, a Train Knight from Verforet. She is the first discoverer of the Ruins of Steel and will be assisting us on this research mission.

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Rouen, that's dangerous-! That tree is a bit too high~! You're too enthusiastic just because you're in front of the SSS!

Name: Rouen
Phrase: Do not fret! I will dance along with the servants of the wind!

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Dancing? That's twice as high as we usually do! Are you sure you can land safely?

Name: Rouen
Phrase: Y-you're noisy! You don't know how much I've practising! Just shut up and watch! And don't tell them my name at this moment!

Name: Rouen
Phrase: ...Then, my kindred! Feast your eyes on my Sacred Holy Power!

Name: Rouen
Phrase: HAH!

Name: Putra
Phrase: A-And she jumped!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Well, I'm sure Rouen will be fine.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Why!? That's not a safe height right!? She's too small, it's not going to be just broken legs if she hits the ground!

Name: Rouen
Phrase: Nothing is not a word in my dictionary! Also, I AM NOT SMALL AT ALL!

Name: Rouen
Phrase: Ultimate Sacred Magic! 'Sacred Holy Wing'!

Name: Rouen
Phrase: Thus I landed...!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Woah! That's amazing! What the heck!? Who is she!? Is she a witch!? A Verforench mystic!?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: She used magic to control the wind when she lands. She does it easily on appearance, but it's application is very difficult.

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Sorry for my delay. I've been bombarded with questions from the Gendarmerie about the discovery of the ruins...

Name: Amiens
Phrase: I'm Amiens and I belong to the Verforet Gendarmerie. And the girl who jumped down from the tree earlier is Rouen, the first discoverer of the Ruins of Steel.

Name: Rouen
Phrase: Yes! I am the discoverer of the Ruins of Steel! Entrusted by the Holy Angel Saint-Sever, the one who brings light upon the world - the Holy Angel, Rive-Droite!

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Huh? Isn't 'Rouen' part of your Holy Name? Rouen-Rive-Droite?

Name: Rouen
Phrase: I only use Rive-Droite when I'm talking to people close to me. Everyone knows my real name is Rouen anyway, right? It's complicated when people mix up my Holy Name and my real name.

Name: Amiens
Phrase: If it sounds complicated, then why don't you just not associate your name with your Holy Name...".

Name: Rouen
Phrase: That's not good enough. Someday, when there's people writing an adventure story where I play a big role, Maman and Papa won't be able to boast, 'She's our daughter' anymore, gosh.

Name: Putra
Phrase: What a lively bunch of kids.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: It's nice that they're having fun, but I wish they'd be a bit more serious...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Mhmhm, the two of you? Let's just leave it at that, shall we? I know you're excited to find the ruins...

Name: Rouen
Phrase: We've already thought of a name for the ruins, combining Rouen's and Amiens' names, we're calling it 'Rouen Ruins'.

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Eh? But that's exactly what your name is, Rouen! Let's at least make it the 'Amiroun Ruins'.

Name: Rouen
Phrase: My name cannot have only 'Rou' in it!

Name: Amiens
Phrase: But there's an 'N' too, right? It's already more than fair for you...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: If you two keep joking around too much, I'll have you both destroyed, capiche?

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Désolé Vivienne.

Name: Rouen
Phrase: I-I was having too much fun.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: All good so long that you understand♪

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooooh, the pressure, the pressure is tense.

Name: Putra
Phrase: I guess Vivienne has a higher rank in the Verforet Gendarmerie.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It's important to have a proper hierarchy for the sake of the state of collective security.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Everyone, today I'm going to enlist the help of these two, Amiens and Rouen. As I said before, these two are very good at exploring ruins.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Isn't that right?

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Y-yes! We have a fair amount of experience in exploring ruins!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Did you do that kind of work in the Gendarmerie?

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Non, it was more of a hobby and at first we just played around with it, but we became exceptionally knowledgable...

Name: Rouen
Phrase: We do some exploration for fun, but we also traverse inside ruins for work.

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Oui! That's it!

Name: Rouen
Phrase: Recently, we've been asked to help out with some serious archaeological research. I believe I myself know a lot about the structure of ancient monuments and ancient scripts.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: That's a relief to hear you say so. Deciphering ancient scripts requires knowledge, but also a knack for it. It's like solving a riddle, and it's a bit difficult for me...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Amiens, Rouen, it's no exaggeration to say that everyone's safety depends on you two. Leave the fighting to us, you two should concentrate on conquering the ruins.

Name: Amiens
Phrase: Leave it to us! We don't even remember how many times we have put our bodies on the line so far. We will use our experience in exploring the ruins to keep you all safe!

Name: Rouen
Phrase: Kuhuhuhuh, I will use my Sacred Holy Power to unlock the door to the Ruins of Steel.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Oui, keep on cutting through a path. Then let's go inside the ruins and start investigating. Amiens, Rouen, please take the lead.
